The Referral Fee

At Daytal we believe in the power of social networks. That’s why we built a platform that keeps track of all the individuals you refer this job to. The best part is that if they continue to refer this position to someone in their own network – you could still earn an equal % of the referral fee – after all… it’s part of your network. Please take a look at the example below:

Friend of “B” named “C”
Friend of “C” Gets the Job
You, A, B and C would split the {{referralText}} referral fee equally
